mapper.sql: id, customer_details_id, contacts_id, contacts_name, mobile_phone, corr_customer, contact_category, business, sex, appellation, genre, department, job, wechat, qq, wechat_name, qq_name, wangwang, mailing_address, work_phone, home_phone, fax, postcode, home_address, hobby, card_id, remarks, habit, interest, `characters`, social_characteristics, spouse, children, annual_income, consumption_habits
mapper.select:
select
from ix_contacts_details
and contact_category like concat(concat('%',#{contactCategory}),'%')
and contacts_name like concat(concat('%',#{contactsName}),'%')
